muruganandam.n

Could you please check the latest BIRT 2.1.3 build? I have done the check, it works well.
You can only deploy birt.war on the weblogic.
Add common-loggin-api.jar into birt.war and under /WEB-INF/lib folder.
Then deploy this war to check it.

Thanks.

Dear Jerry,

Thanks for reply, I couldn't able to get BIRT 2.3 version, but I am able to download BIRT 2.1.2 and I added common-logging-api.jar in to WEB-INF/lib folder on birt.war. Still I am getting Same errror.

Please give me suggestion to come out from this issue. My application fully rely on BIRT Reports.

I have done the check BIRT 2.1.2 with weblogic 9.0. It works well. What's your weblogic version?

Dear Jeery,

Now its working fine with BIRT 2.1.2 and Weblogic 9.0(windows) and Weblogic 9.1(Solaris). I deployed BIRT 2.1.2 on weblogic 9.2(windows), its gave same exception then I uninstalled Weblogic 9.2 and installed Weblogic 9.0 and deployed BIRT War on Weblogic 9.0(windows).
Now I am able to view the BIRT Reports.

and Now I am trying to integrate BIRT viewrs with my j2ee application , Exception am getting like 

<Apr 17, 2007 3:58:51 PM IST> <Error> <HTTP> <BEA-101017> <[weblogic.servlet.internal.WebAppServletC

muruganandam.n

I guess you use the oracle XML parser. It has conflict between xmlparser.jar and xerces.jar. BIRT depends on xerces.jar, so cause this issue. 

You can change JAVA options as following and try it again.

-Djavax.xml.parsers.SAXParserFactory=org.apache.xerces.jaxp.SAXParserFactoryImpl
-Djavax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory=org.apache.xerces.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl

causedBy.message: $NO-RB$ Could not find the Framework - [L ava.lang.Object;@1d58963

traces.message: Class org/eclipse/birt/core/framework/IPlatform viola tes loader constraints
